title: Vertex Locates On The Axis of Symmetry
text: The vertex is a point on the line of symmetry, so its x-coordinate will be $$x=-5$$. We only need to compute f(-5) to get the y coordinate.

title: Compute The y-coordinate
text: Plug $$x=-5$$ into the equation $$f(x)=x^2+10x+25$$. What is f(-5)?

title: Put The Answer Into (x,y)
text: As the final answer, we can put together the x and y coordinates which gives (-5,0).
